mapper.insert: insert into user (uid, uname, password, user_role, phone, email, description, ability, preference, activity, equipment, cooperation, evaluation, similarity) values (#{uid}, #{uname}, #{password}, #{user_role}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{description}, #{ability}, #{preference}, #{activity}, #{equipment}, #{cooperation}, #{evaluation}, #{similarity})
mapper.select: select uid, uname, password, user_role, phone, email, description, ability, preference, activity, equipment, cooperation, evaluation, similarity from user where uname = #{uname}
select uid, uname, password, user_role, phone, email, description, ability, preference, activity, equipment, cooperation, evaluation, similarity from user where uid = #{uid}
